subject: Cancel order
description_text:
Hi,

I need to cancel my order so I can order the Pro X instead of the plus.
Order number is SSN3368.

Best,

Derek Polkamp

conversations.body_text: Hi D Polkamp,    We can modify your order directly. Please let me know which specifications you need to purchase? Pro X Ultra P2-H2?

Yep. Just need haptics on the brake really.

Best,

Derek Polkamp

On Mon, Nov 10, 2025 at 4:52 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi D Polkamp,    You can add the desired products back to your cart and send us a screenshot. We will make the changes for you.

Here you go.

On Mon, Nov 10, 2025 at 5:58 AM support@simsonn.com
Okay, you can click this link to pay the difference.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1

Done

On Mon, Nov 10, 2025 at 9:45 PM support@simsonn.com
